message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.GR 

The paper deals with the problem of Single Image Super-Resolution (SISR) using deep learning methods. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper proposes a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to estimate spatially variant interpolation kernels, which involves training the model in an end-to-end manner. This suggests that the paper could also belong to the categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also explores ways to improve the results for large upscaling factors, which could fall under the category of cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper extends the method to the task of joint image filtering, which could be related to the category of cs.GR (Graphics).
